const response = await client.index({
  index: "my-index-000001",
  id: 1,
  refresh: "true",
  document: {
    cost_price: 100,
  },
});
console.log(response);

const response1 = await client.search({
  index: "my-index-000001",
  script_fields: {
    sales_price: {
      script: {
        lang: "expression",
        source: "doc['cost_price'] * markup",
        params: {
          markup: 0.2,
        },
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response1);
